data.title: Traditional Mexican Home cooking
data.text: If you want ambiance, this is not the place. When you are hungry for the best Mexican food this is the location. The cooking is amazing. I enjoy the perfectly crisp taquitos, the rice is fluffy and never hard or soggy, the enchiladas are so good. Just writing the review makes me want to go there as soon as possible.

data.title: GREAT MEXICAN FOOD! Pedro is the Best Chef in Fresno!
data.text:
GREAT MEXICAN FOOD! Pedro is the Best Chef in Fresno!  Try the carne asada.
Food and authentic Mexican ambience!

data.title: Locals know...this is the place.
data.text: I grew up in this neighborhood...and I am into my 40's.  Adrian's has ALWAYS been the spot for great burritos.  When you have that craving...Adrian's NEVER disappoints.

data.title: Great food, very friendly service, no waiting long
data.text: They make the food on site, not brought in or frozen.  All cooking is done with fresh foods.  Home made tortillas are great because they make them the way you like them or made to order.  Food is very tasty with great flavor.

data.title: Could be a Fresno Landmark
data.text: Adrian's is a old Fresno Favorite, with a Mexican American Flare.  The BBR is my Favorite it's good old fashion home cooking the way your "Abuelita" used to make.  The best part is homemade flour tortillas.  So good! No place for eating in but great for take-out.

data.title: best burritos
data.text: the best bean burritos and the best carne asada burritos on Belmont.  this place has been around for a long time and is still very good. a great hol e in the wall restaurant.

data.title: Try the Beef Quesadillas!
data.text: Those of us familiar with this place know it as having some of the best Mexican food around.  The salsa is awesome!  Don't miss out.

data.title: Good Food
data.text: Adrian's food is very good and their prices are reasonable.Tortillas are handmade. Their Nacho's are the best with lot's of beans, meat, sour cream, cheese,  guacamole plenty to share. Big Burrito's and yummy Taco's. I love to go there one of my favorites. There is nowhere to sit, it is pick up only and that part of town is kinda sketchy but the food is definitely worth it. Get's really busy at lunchtime so go early if you can.

data.title: Best Burritos in town
data.text: one of the best Burritos ever, Home made Flour tortillas make a Big difference Also try the Chimichanga, Ha  and don't forget to ask for extra salsa, it's soooo delicious

data.title: Homemade Heaven!!
data.text: This little mom and pop has been off the grid for a long time. A real "locals" place. Some of the best really homemade Mexican food in the city. A peak into the back kitchen will expose the 2-3 little elderly Mexican ladies that churn out these excellent dishes. Easily, a must stop if traveling into the city.

data.title: Neighborhood Gem
data.text: My husband and I love to go to Adrian's for good homecooked Mexican takeout. The food has been consistent through the 20+ years we've lived in the neighborhood! The tortillas are fresh made and the meat is so tender and done perfectly. Plan to take home your dinner or eat outside and watch the cars go by! You won't be disappointed with the menu, there is something for everybody, even our picky boys ate the burritos!

data.title: Love the Shredded Beef Tacos.
data.text: The flour tortillas are hand made. The beans are one of the best in Fresno. This is old style traditional food. The type my grandmother would make. The burritos are huge...

data.title: BEST CHICKEN NACHOS
data.text: wWhen your are trying to eat healthy , but you just gotta have some nacos, Adriand chien nachos truly satisfies both needs.. They start with boiled chicken, de boned, and served to absolutly to prefection... Once you try their chicken nachos you will become addicted to the flavor.....

data.title: Adrian's...Fresno's best kept secret!!!
data.text: Best Mexican food in Fresno at a great price.  Family owned/operated business, making amazing traditional meals.

data.title: Quick & Yummy
data.text: The Best Lengua burritos in town! Always a line so call in your order for less wait. Nachos are also great!

data.title: Hidden Gem
data.text: Adrian's has been around for years and it's a hidden gem.  The food is simple and the tortillas are homemade!!  I love the Shredded beef quesadillas's and the hot sauce.  The staff are very nice and friendly too.
